title: Smoked haddock fish cakes
ingredients: ['5 medium potatoes', '2 glasses milk', '2 salmon fillets', '3 smoked haddock (or cod) fillets', '200g king prawns', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise (or soured cream)', '120g plain flour', '2 eggs', '125g breadcrumbs (or crushed cornflakes)', 'oil']
